Package org.mokai.impl.camel

Mokai implementation based on Apache Camel.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ConnectorServiceChangeListener  
 

Class Summary
AbstractCamelConnectorService ConnectorService implementation based on Apache Camel.
AbstractRouter Base class of ApplicationsRouter and ConnectionsRouter.
ActionsProcessor Camel Processor implementation used by AbstractCamelConnectorService to execute actions (pre-processing, post-processing and post-receiving).
ApplicationsRouter Decides which application will handle a message.
CamelApplicationService Concrete ConnectorService.
CamelConnectionService Concrete ConnectorService.
CamelRoutingEngine An Apache Camel based implementation of the RoutingEngine
ConnectionsRouter Decides which connection will handle a message.
FailedMessagesMonitor  
LifecycleMethodsHelper Helper class with static methods to support lifecycle operations on objects.
PersistenceProcessor Camel Processor implementation used by the CamelRoutingEngine to save or update messages.
PersistenceRouter  
RedeliveryPolicy Defines the maximum redeliveries and delay between attempts that the CamelRoutingEngine should perform on org.mokaiProcessors before declaring the message as failed.
ResourceInjector Helper class to inject resources into objects.
ResourceRegistry  
UriConstants Uri endpoints used by Apache Camel to route the messages between applications and connections.
 

Package org.mokai.impl.camel Description

Mokai implementation based on Apache Camel.
